about.title: About
about.text1: Hey, i'm a software developer, graduated in software engenering in Ucsal. Actually i work at Solutis , i am {{years}} years old and i am from Salvador, Bahia, Brazil. Fullstack developer mainly with Java and React. Currently interested in data sience, more specificaly in text mining and nlp with Python.
